title: Google\Cloud\Core\PhpArray
name: PhpArray
description:
Extend the Protobuf-PHP array codec to allow messages to match the format used for REST.

Extends \DrSlump\Protobuf\Codec\PhpArray

params.name: customFilters
params.description: A set of callbacks to apply to properties in a gRPC response.

params.name: useCamelCase
params.description: Whether to convert key casing to camelCase. }
